meanings.definition: The state or condition of being a survivor.
meanings.sent1: Her survivorships after the accident inspired many.
meanings.sent2: The survivorships of the hiker were celebrated by the community.
meanings.sent3: His survivorships in the video game made him the champion.
meanings.sent4: The survivorships of the old tree in the storm were remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The survivorships of the tiny seed in the harsh soil were truly miraculous.

meanings.definition: The rights or status of a survivor.
meanings.sent1: She fought for her survivorships in court.
meanings.sent2: The survivorships of the war veterans were honored.
meanings.sent3: His survivorships entitled him to special privileges.
meanings.sent4: The survivorships of the hero granted him freedom.
meanings.sent5: The survivorships of the animal in the sanctuary were protected by law.

meanings.definition: The act of surviving or outliving something.
meanings.sent1: The survivorships of the fittest are crucial in nature.
meanings.sent2: His survivorships in the wilderness were a testament to his skills.
meanings.sent3: The survivorships of the battery exceeded all expectations.
meanings.sent4: The survivorships of the ancient ruins amazed the archaeologists.
meanings.sent5: The survivorships of the rare species brought hope for conservation efforts.
